description.cdata: Attention Passengers: This weekend there will be no BART trains running between Fruitvale and Coliseum stations all day Saturday and Sunday while maintenance crews upgrade the trackway to improve reliability and safety. BART will provide a free bus bridge. Visit bart.gov for more info. BART to OAK airport service will be in full operation.

sms_text.cdata: This weekend there will be no BART trains running between FTVL and COLS stns all day saturday and sunday while maintenance crews upgrade trackway to improve reliability and safety. BART will provide a free bus bridge. Visit BART.gov for more info. BART to oak airport svc will be in full operation.
